# [FEAT] Social Media Integration

## Labels
`omnichannel`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement social media channel integrations for support through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and WhatsApp.

## Requirements

### Supported Platforms
- Facebook Messenger
- Facebook Posts/Comments
- Twitter/X Direct Messages
- Twitter/X Mentions
- Instagram Direct
- Instagram Comments
- WhatsApp Business
- LinkedIn (optional)

### Message Handling
- Social messages create tickets
- Reply from ticket interface
- Maintain conversation context
- Media/attachment support
- Emoji and reactions

### Account Management
- Connect multiple social accounts
- Brand-specific accounts
- Account authentication (OAuth)
- Permission management

### Social Features
- Public vs. private message handling
- Sentiment detection
- Trending topic alerts
- Social listening (optional)
- Response time tracking

### Compliance
- Message retention policies
- Privacy regulations compliance
- Data handling controls
- Audit logging

## Zendesk Reference
With Messaging, you can extend your AI agents and workflows to WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, and more.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Major platforms integrated
- [ ] Messages create tickets
- [ ] Replies work correctly
- [ ] Media supported
- [ ] Account management works
